name: TicTAKO
description:
TicTacToe but it's on Ina's forehead and the loser faces her divine punishment. You can also play against AO-Chan as Holomyth members.

IF YOU ARE PLAYING ON A PC BROWSER AND THE GAME DOES NOT FIT YOUR SCREEN, GOING FULLSCREEN SHOULD FIX IT.
  • Play Tic Tac Toe on Ina's forehead as other Holomyth Members!
  • Play against your friends in the 2 Player Local Multiplayer mode!
  • Play against AO-Chan in the 1 Player mode!

The game can be played with a Mouse or Touchscreen.

Created and Developed by Salty_Pizza.

Based on Ninomae Ina'nis, Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, Watson Amelia, and Gawr Gura of Hololive-EN.

This is a fan game. I am not affiliated with Hololive.
